title: ROBOSTIM 1.0 Workshop
location: Intelligent System Design Lab, TP1509, SRMIST
shortDescription: A hands-on robotics workshop for 1st-year Computing Technologies students at SRMIST.
content: The Department of Computing Technologies organized the ROBOSTIM 1.0 Workshop on 9th November 2023 at the Intelligent System Design Lab TP1509. It was attended by 1st-year students from the Computing Technologies department.

The workshop began with an introductory session by Dr. E. Poovammal, who explained the lab's vision and objectives. Mr. Thirumalazhagan from SiGe Tech conducted the next session, covering the components used in robotics and demonstrating the DOFBOT robotic arm.

Trained students Mr. Shivam Bansal and Mr. Kavin Sundareswaran (2nd year CTECH) then led a TINKER CAD simulation session, helping students prototype their ideas virtually before implementing them physically. The event concluded with team activities where students simulated and implemented basic robotic setups.

title: Robo Workshop 2025
location: Tech Park 1, SRM Institute of Science and Technology
shortDescription: A robotics workshop for school students featuring hands-on training with Smorphi kits.
content: The Robo Workshop 2025, held on 19th July 2025 at Tech Park 1, SRM Institute of Science and Technology, brought together 50+ students from over 5 schools for an exciting introduction to robotics and hands-on hardware development.

Participants received guided training on Smorphi robotics kits—modular, open-source platforms ideal for rapid prototyping. They learned about the fundamentals of robotic systems and engaged in assembling and programming their own robots using the provided kits.

The Smorphi platform enabled students to test algorithms and simulate payloads in real-time, fostering creativity and engineering thinking. This experience bridged the gap between theoretical learning and practical application, and provided a glimpse into modern prototyping practices used in industry.

The workshop concluded with interactive challenges where teams presented their Smorphi builds and demonstrated various robotic tasks, encouraging teamwork, problem-solving, and innovation among young learners.

title: RoboFest 2025
location: SRM Institute of Science and Technology
shortDescription: SRMIST’s premier robotics and innovation festival, showcasing the best in robotics, AI, and automation through competitions, exhibitions, and technical challenges.
content: RoboFest is SRMIST’s flagship robotics and innovation event, attracting students and professionals from across the nation. Over three days of high-voltage tech battles, workshops, and showcases, RoboFest celebrates the spirit of engineering and creation.

Participants compete in high-stakes robotics challenges like Robo Wars, Line Followers, and Drone Racing. The event aims to nurture problem-solving, teamwork, and innovation through real-world robotics applications.
From beginners to seasoned robotics teams, RoboFest offers something for every innovator.
